const newprovider = ethers.getDefaultProvider();newprovider.getBlockNumber().then((blockNumber) => {console.log("Current block number:", blockNumber);});
});
    console.log("Current block number:", blockNumber);

const newProvider = ethers.getDefaultProvider();

});
